author: Natilee M
title: Most beautiful wine area - tasting, architecture, history and garden s
text:
lovely hotel and spa with a magnificent breakfast - oysters even and champagne.
elegance and history on a wine estate. well located..great wine tasting experience and reasonable shipping wine back to USA - it worked and was so fun to receive a couple months later
Room Tip: beautiful expansive rooms off courtyards See more room tips
